31#ifndef _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_DEBUG_H_
32#define _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_DEBUG_H_
33
34#ifdef _KERNEL
35#include <sys/types.h>
36#include <sys/systm.h>
37
38#include_next <sys/debug.h>
39
40#define assfail(a, f, l) \
41 (panic("solaris assert: %s, file: %s, line: %d", (a), (f), (l)), 0)
42
43#define assfail3(a, lv, op, rv, f, l) \
44 panic("solaris assert: %s (0x%jx %s 0x%jx), file: %s, line: %d", \
45 (a), (uintmax_t)(lv), (op), (uintmax_t)(rv), (f), (l))
46#else /* !_KERNEL */
47
48#include <stdio.h>
49#include <stdlib.h>
50
51#include_next <sys/debug.h>
52
53#ifndef HAVE_ASSFAIL
54extern int aok;
55
56static __inline int
57__assfail(const char *expr, const char *file, int line)
58{
59
60 (void)fprintf(stderr, "Assertion failed: (%s), file %s, line %d.\n",
61 expr, file, line);
62 if (!aok)
63 abort();
64 return (0);
65}
66#define assfail __assfail
67#endif
68
69#ifndef HAVE_ASSFAIL3
70extern int aok;
71
72static inline void
73__assfail3(const char *expr, uintmax_t lv, const char *op, uintmax_t rv,
74 const char *file, int line) {
75
76 (void)fprintf(stderr,
77 "Assertion failed: %s (0x%jx %s 0x%jx), file %s, line %d.\n",
78 expr, lv, op, rv, file, line);
79 if (!aok)
80 abort();
81}
82#define assfail3 __assfail3
83#endif
84
85#endif /* !_KERNEL */
86
87#endif /* _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_DEBUG_H_ */
88
